did.head: DESCRIPTIVE SUMMARY
did.unittitle: Bricklayers International Union, Local 2 Book of Minutes, 1938-1942
did.repository: Kheel Center for Labor-Management Documentation and Archives, Cornell University Library
did.abstract: Book of meeting minutes for the Bricklayers, Masons and Plasterers, Local 2, covering from May 6, 1938 to September 18, 1942.

bioghist.head: ORGANIZATIONAL HISTORY
bioghist.p: Local 2 of the Bricklayers, Masons and Plasterers was based in Niagara Falls, New York.

scopecontent.head: COLLECTION DESCRIPTION
scopecontent.p: Book of meeting minutes for the Bricklayers, Masons and Plasterers, Local 2, covering from May 6, 1938 to September 18, 1942. The minutes are contained in a single bound volume.

controlaccess.head: Names:
controlaccess.corpname: Bricklayers, Masons and Plasterers' International Union of America. Local 2 (Niagara Falls, N.Y.)

controlaccess.head: Subjects:
controlaccess.subject: Bricklayers -- New York (State) -- Niagara Falls
Labor unions -- New York (State) -- Niagara Falls

accessrestrict.head: Access Restrictions:
accessrestrict.p: Access to the collections in the Kheel Center is restricted. Please contact a reference archivist for access to these materials.

userestrict.head: Restrictions on Use:
userestrict.p: This collection must be used in keeping with the Kheel Center Information Sheet and Procedures for Document Use.
